properties.Location: 3361 S. Signal Butte Road  Fire Station 219
properties.URL_1: Learn more about station 219 solar power
properties.Describe: The goal was LEED silver, but the outcome was LEED gold. This Mesa fire station is a great role model for other sustainability efforts in the city and is one of the first LEED certified City of Mesa buildings.

properties.Location: Fire Station 220  5763 E Main St. Mesa  AZ 85205
properties.URL_1: Learn more about station 220 solar power
properties.Describe: One of the first LEED certified city of Mesa buildings. 7.5% of the energy used comes from the sun with a 15.18 kW photovoltaic system.
Green roof captures and guides rain water to plants below
